headline.main: This Article Contains a Mixture of Choice Turkish and Domestic Blends

docs.abstract: Dr Frank A Oski humorous article on why he smokes; drawing (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: SYRACUSE "Look at you a doctor smoking!" is a remark directed at me with such monotonous regularity that it has required me to formulate a satisfactory response to all those seemingly health-conscious but uninformed individuals who appear to be multiplying in numbers more rapidly than rabbits in a confined area.
